name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Hector Martinez)
description:
Dungeon Escape, a survivor-like game, where you are imprisioned and you have to fight for your freedom.

  • Move with WASD, or controller

A game by Hector Martinez

Attributions

  • Graphics from "Tiny Dungeon" by KenneyNL (https://www.kenney.nl)
  • Music and effects from "8-Bit Music and SFX" by Joel Steudler (https://www.joelsteudler.com)
  • A game made with the Godot Engine (https://godotengine.org/license)
